snippet.title: Lost Ark: Launch Reveal Trailer – The Game Awards
snippet.description:
On February 11, 2022 explore the massive world of Arkesia in an epic MMO action RPG. The battle between order and chaos has created a land full of mystery and magic. But the war isn’t over. The demons of Kazeros will stop at nothing until Arkesia falls. Find the The Ark to end the madness.

Steam: https://bit.ly/3yssmaF
Amazon: https://amzn.to/3qSa9kr

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3uYhjE8
Twitch: https://bit.ly/3g5I1qm
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3uYBP7L
TikTok: https://bit.ly/3z5QXU5
Facebook: https://bit.ly/3w46gdP
Forums: forums.playlostark.com

#LostArk #GameAwards #Trailer
